TopicTitle: New to KSP! New to space flight!

Articles.Content:
Hi all! After playing with the demo I've broken down and bought the full game. After just 4 hours I've built a couple space stations and started populating space with my junk! I have a lot to learn, like docking and refueling, but I've managed to get a 57 ton station orbiting Kerbal @880Km.

I wish there was a orbital space dock where you could build ships outside the Kerbal atmosphere!

I got a ton of questions!!

multiplayer? there's going to be a multiplayer?

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10152187331048927&set=pcb.10152220892688460&type=1&theater

Welcome to the forums! Feel free to ask questions about any aspect of the game that's confusing you, or look at a few of the tutorials I've collected in the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked through my signature.

The developers have indeed confirmed that they plan to include a multiplayer mode eventually. You might find this article to be enlightening on the subject.

In general, make yourself at home

Questions? We love answering those.

Welcome to the forums!
can you point me towards a tutorial that shows how to make separate space station parts that go together in space
There ya go...

Yeah, Scott Manley makes a lot of great videos.

If you ever have any questions, the link below is a good forum to find answers. You can dig around in there and see if your question has been asked, or post and we are more than happy to answer.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/15-Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorials

There is also a Tutorial sub-forum in there with text, picture, and video tutorials for all kinds of things (in case you don't have fast enough internet for streaming long movies).
